actions.text: On agreeing to the Skaggs amendments (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendments increase the appropriation for energy conservation programs by $8 million and reduce the minerals management program by $4 million and the fossil energy program by $4 million.
purpose: An amendment to reduce by $4 million both the bill's $359 million appropriation for fossil energy programs and its $187 million appropriation for the Minerals Management Service. Under the amendment, the $8 million would be transferred to increase energy conservation program funding from $500 million to $508 million.
